title: ESS Food Recalls Pork Products Produced Without Benefit of Import Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 20, 2015 ESS Food, a Danish establishment, is recalling approximately 50,904 pounds of pork belly product produced in Poland that was not presented at the U.S. point of entry for inspection, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced...
